sentences.sContent: They had safes in their shop and some people would say to the goldsmith I have some valuables.
sentences.sContent_eng: They had safes in their shop and some people would say to the goldsmith I have some valuables.
sentences.sCn: 他们在自己的店里有保险柜,有些人会对这些金匠说,我有一些贵重物品。

sentences.sContent: The goldsmith might also write notes promising so much gold and not promising the return of any particular item of gold.
sentences.sContent_eng: The goldsmith might also write notes promising so much gold and not promising the return of any particular item of gold.
sentences.sCn: 这个金匠会写下票据,保证归还一定数量的金子,但是不保证归还某个特定的金器

trans.tranOther: someone who makes or sells things made from gold
